message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your openness to discussion. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your position, however,  $1,000,000 is significantly below the true value of this product.  I could consider letting it go for $1,350,000. This feels like a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer with $1,250,000. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product. I look forward to your response.
